website_summaries.verdict: The best value. An ideal investment for someone who wants a clean, practical work area without a lot of extra storage features.
pros: Provides an astounding 67 inches of workspace which can accommodate up to four monitors
cons: Does not have the bells and whistles of some of the more expensive desks

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret it!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, well designed desk, very easy to put together, even for one person. Directions in manual were clear, and came with 4 different configurations (you can switch the long and short sides, and put the keyboard tray under either side). Very happy with this purchase! 12/11/2019: Still using this desk! It survived a move and is still it great condition.
customer_reviews.author: monkey39

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: Doable with one person, but having two makes it TONS easier. Be sure that you want this table as I wouldn't dream of being able to pack it back up in order to return it. I think it would be impossible unless you took video of yourself unpacking it. The only issue I have is that I would have like to move the stand to one of the sides for a monitor or something rather than in the corner. But still five stars from me.
customer_reviews.author: Babbles

customer_reviews.title: Great Desk!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this desk for a dual monitor set up with a tower. The desk came on time from the supplier and was not damaged from shipping. The desk was easy to put together and you can do it by yourself. The instructions were easy to understand and nothing was missing. The desk comes with a small screwdriver and wrench I was not expecting. Overall, I was very happy with this purchase and I definitely support this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Several Layout Options & Easy To Assemble!
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to put together by myself in about and hour and half. You can choose several different layout options to make it fit your room exactly the way that you want. The one drawback is you have to be very careful what you put on top, it get's a lot of little scratches in it very easily with the paper "wood" overlay. Overall however, it looks fantastic in my office and serves the purpose I needed as well as being a perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: CBRGIRL600

customer_reviews.title: I love this desk.
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this desk. I have it close to a year now, and it's perfect for me. My daughter put it together for me by herself and she said it wasn't very hard and the instructions are easy to follow. The only only problem I have is the pull out drawer where I type--it can get stuck, but easily solved.
customer_reviews.author: rhonda sanders

customer_reviews.title: Took a couple hours to put together with the two ...
customer_reviews.text: Took a couple hours to put together with the two of us working on it (I cannot imagine trying to do it solo at a couple points there's some tricky bits), but it's rock solid, one computer, one laptop and one digital art pad with room to spare. Getting a second monitor cause I have the room even with the tower still on top of the desk with everything else!
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Pelton

customer_reviews.title: Nice Desk!
customer_reviews.text: I received this desk in a timely fashion - thank you Amazon! It came in two heavy boxes with a bunch of parts. However, the instructions were easy to follow and I had it together in about two hours by myself. My husband was very relieved he didn't come home to me crying with parts everywhere. We've been using it for about a month and like the way it is set up and that is doesn't take up a ton of room. I would recommend one thing...the instruction say to tighten all of the screws down again when you are done - do this. Otherwise it will wiggle a bit when you try to move it around.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Stunning and solid
customer_reviews.text: This desk is amazing in quality. The wood feels sturdy and looks stunning. The support pole snapped the first bit of moving that occured, but it is sturdy enough without it.
customer_reviews.author: rrrdddxxx

customer_reviews.title: An awesome desk
customer_reviews.text: I work with digital photography and video which often requires me to have multiple computers running at once. This desk was the perfect solution to the cluttered mess of computers, monitors and external hard drives. I am very impressed with the construction of this desk and also rather enjoyed the assembly process. The instructions were much better than other furniture I have assembled and nothing felt cheaply made. I also like the modular design of it. This means I can take the three main pieces apart to move it if I need to. This desk is the heart of my office now and I am delighted with it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott W Stolsenberg

customer_reviews.title: Great desk
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a new L-shaped desk, but didn't want to spend a lot of money. Of the desks I looked at, this was the best rated of the cheapest, so I decided to try it. I have to say it's exceeded my expectations. I'm not overly crazy about the funky style, but it does have a certain charm. I'd also prefer to have a little more in terms of shelves/hutch or drawers or something, but the space it provides and the sturdiness make up for that. It was also very easy to assemble. I recall having difficulty with screwing in one piece, but otherwise it was a snap, which is often not the case for assemble-it-yourself products.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce A. Gulke

customer_reviews.title: Nice desk - easy setup
customer_reviews.text: I love the desk. It's just what I was looking for. We have a 27" iMac on one side and my work laptop on the other. The setup was quick and easy. Maybe the easiest furniture I have assembled. Every part was labeled and it included extra screws just incase. I put it together by myself in about an hour and a half using only the tools included in the box. It's sturdy and seems very well made. Nothing was damaged in transit even though the box looked a little rough. For the price it's absolutely incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: This desk is so roomy and solid. I have ...
customer_reviews.text: This desk is so roomy and solid. I have a 5 gallon aquarium, monitor, keyboard, mouse, speaker system (with 4 speaker related items), printer, desktop caddy, tissue box, and several piles of misc. papers and junk on mine and still room to spare! The keyboard drawer hung a bit too low for me to use it with my too-tall chair, but that's no problem. The desk is deep enough (from back to front) to accomodate a 23 inch monitor and a large contoured keyboard in front of it, and still room to spare there too.
customer_reviews.author: Terra

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the money, takes 2 to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Cons: 1) It's heavy so you may need help getting it to the room you're going to use it in. 2) There was an error in the assembly diagram that caused us to have to take some of it apart and reassemble. 3) Although it's relatively easy to assemble it took well over an hour. It's a 2 person job for sure. Pros: 1) It's good quality for the money; solid, pieces fit nicely, attractive, durable. 2) Good assembly directions except for one error in the diagrams. 3) Parts marked very well. 4) Offers a lot of desk space and functionality. 5) I think it's ideal for a home office, which is how I use it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: So good, I own two
customer_reviews.text: So good, I own two. The directions are pretty good and direct perhaps the less mechanically inclined to assemble the desk properly. However, you can build both frames, add the keyboard drawer, and then attach the frames to the table tops with the table tops on the ground (carpet if available) for an easier installation. You can also reconfigure the desk in any of the four configurations in maybe 30 minutes if you need the desk oriented differently for a different location or whatever.
customer_reviews.author: TCombel

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy except for the keyboard tray
customer_reviews.text: The table arrived in two days using Amazon Prime. The packaging is good with plenty of padding and foam to support the enclosed wooden parts. Assembly took roughly 2 hours with one person. The assembled product was sturdy and the veneer finishes are well-done. However, I am not satisfied with the flimsy construction of the keyboard tray. The tray jerks and is not stable when extended fully. There should have been a locking mechanism. Resting my palms on my keyboard gives me a less-than-satisfactory typing experience.
customer_reviews.author: Twilight Dweller

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Desk, for Low Price
customer_reviews.text: This desk is awesome, exactly the right size and what I wanted. For as large as it is, it was pretty easy to put together, probably took about an hour and a half with my husband and I. The instructions were great and all the parts were neatly labeled in individual packages. The only thing I don't care for is the middle stand, I guess that is where you should put your monitor but I just have my printer sitting up on it. The color is exactly as pictured. Would buy again, came in two separate boxes as well.
customer_reviews.author: simplyguruu

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I just put this together a few days ago. The instructions were very easy to follow, and we had no problems throughout the process of assembling it. It did take us over an hour to assemble, but it wasn't difficult by any means. The only thing that might be a negative for some, is that it does NOT include the little computer tower holder for the corner below the desk. This was not an issue for me because I wasn't planning on using it anyways, but there were a lot of pictures of them in the previous comments.
customer_reviews.author: rgn12

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking desk and it was very easy to assemble, although the metal side legs really hurt when they fall over onto your foot! That aside, it was simple to assemble by myself and only took about an hour. The finished desk looked good for the few minutes but very quickly got covered in papers, action figures, scale car models and other items so now you can hardly see it under all the stuff. FYI - the small raised corner shelf is the perfect height to park the Batmobile under while the shelf holds a phaser, communicator and tricorder perfectly...
customer_reviews.author: Steve Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: My work desk
customer_reviews.text: Work from home 40 hours a week and really like this desk. Have 2 full sized desktops on it and works fine. Like being able to change configuration to have long/short sides on either end. 1000+ hours at this desk so far and not disappointed. Haven't had any issues with the finish I've seen complaints about but I keep my workspace clean. No peeling or bubbling from heat of coffee cups either. It is pressed wood so move it carefully but otherwise, it's sturdy, looks good and functionally fine.
customer_reviews.author: The Broke Outdoorsman

customer_reviews.title: Good looking.
customer_reviews.text: I'm sitting at this as I write, and love this desk.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Betzner

customer_reviews.title: The instructions are great. Just finished building it and it is beautiful ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything important is adjustable! You can pick which side to have the long side on and what side to put the keyboard tray on. The instructions are great. Just finished building it and it is beautiful and stable. I'd recommend building it yourself if you want to be able to adjust it any way any time. One of the best purchases I've ever made in my life. I'll update if something comes up.
customer_reviews.author: Aakash Sapre

customer_reviews.title: Love this desk
customer_reviews.text: This desk is awesome.... lots of space and made with quality and durability in mind. Sure beats those IKEA made kits and the versatility options are available as well. (left hand/right hand, keyboard drawer location, etc.) Perfect for my dual 28" screen setup and plenty of space for printers, scanners, hard drives, speakers, etc. w/ still lots of free desk space area. The price was absolutely perfect and I even saw this same desk listed for double the price at other locations... so shop around for best price on this. I've seen other desks even going for higher price and looked cheaper in quality. This was a great purchase, indeed!
customer_reviews.author: D. Cromer

customer_reviews.title: Just right!
customer_reviews.text: Nice desk! Solid construction... Looks great and easy to construct... There ARE holes to allow the builder to put this together with the longer (41-1/4") L-section going to the left side or to the right (Note that the instruction booklet only describes how to put it together with the longer section on the RIGHT). The shorter section (31-1/2") has the keyboard attachment. The middle segment (21-5/8" x 21-5/8") is square.
customer_reviews.author: M. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great looking desk that is surprisingly easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to put together. You can invert the direction of the L shaped desk if you want too, even though the directions don't specify that. Just flip the desk around and put it together backwards, the holes are all there to do so. Be careful when putting the corner support pole into the desk, the threaded stud that attaches the pole to the desk breaks very easily. The desk quality is pretty good, and it looks great. I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: James M.

customer_reviews.title: Would I repurchase? Yes, and probably will in the near future.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an L-shaped desk for a new office staff member. This fit the bill. The pictures do not do it justice. It looks professional, sturdy, and quality made. I did not put it together, so I cannot attest to the level of difficulty for its assembly or the amount of time required to assemble it. I will say, though, that the employee put it together herself. The price was right. Would I repurchase? Yes, and probably will in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: KAVA

customer_reviews.title: Love it.  Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for years and love it just as much as when I bought it. Not hard to put together. I don't have to sit just one way. Room for more then one monitor or a big TV .....etc. I see the one they post now has a post in the corner the helps to hold it up. That makes it perfect. Wish they had that wen I bought one.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: great desk but has a metal smell after assembly and missing rubber feet
customer_reviews.text: The desk was missing rubber feet to go above the adjustable feet to protect from cutting your toes open. it also had a strong strong metal smell to it which has remained even weeks after assembly. Great for space but just those minor complaints. The wood is MDF composite. It doesnt have the strongest or greatest wood finish but it does look nice if you can respect it and use it respectfully as an adult would.
customer_reviews.author: Rembrandt Brown

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy for a computer desk as long as you put ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what it say's it is, very sturdy for a computer desk as long as you put it together correctly. Which is easy to do, took me about 2 hours. Make sure you have your own Phillips screwdriver as you'd destroy your hand trying to screw in everything with the extremely tiny screwdriver provided.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great desk for the price!
customer_reviews.text: PRO's-Solid, comfortable, and a great amount of desk space. For the price this is one of the best desks I have ever purchased. Took about 30 minutes to put together, and the end result is a sleek sturdy built desk that is sure to last a good while, and look good in nearly any room you choose to place it. Even came with extra parts incase of misplacement. Can be assembled in either "L" direction to the left or right and keyboard drawer moveable with different anchor points. CON's- the only downside I have found, is the laminated compressed wood product, not actual wood, yet it is still very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Freas Garringer

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Much better quality than I expected. I wish it had pre-drilled mounting points for putting the keyboard tray on the longer return "desk". The best part was that UPS didnt beat it up while delivering it. I would like it to be slightly deeper and longer on both sides. VERY satisfied. Fit and finish... DUDES!! its MDF what are you expecting?
customer_reviews.author: pkodyssey

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and has a nice look
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and has a nice look. It need more than two hours to install it if your are doing it alone without a helper because there are a lot of parts need to be installed; however, after you done, it's look great. The size, the colors, and the shape work great for my office. So I recommend it to all.
customer_reviews.author: Layth

customer_reviews.title: Love this desk
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Instructions were easy to follow. Table is durable and provides lots of room for all my stuff. I love being about to set the computer in the center and use the curve to give my arms better support.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great Desk - Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This desk has worked out really well. Bought this 4 years ago and still holds strong. I did move the keyboard to the other side of the desk for convenience. Very easy to assemble and gives great air to my PC since it does get warm. The extra shelf in the back is nice too!
customer_reviews.author: Don Engle

customer_reviews.title: Work and have space
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new desk that more work area available. Looking for 2 months I decided on this one. It went together very easily. I absolutely love it. Room for everything I keep on my desk and lots of room to work on projects. The leg area under the desk was very important for me as I had a knee replacement and need to stretch my leg out. Take a good look at the desk and don't hesitate to orde one.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Great desk
customer_reviews.text: Great desk. There was one spot that the assembly directions were a little tough, but overall set up was very easy. I like that you can switch the short side and the long side to fit your needs. The cpu caddy is also a great added feature. It makes placing/moving your tower very easy. I would definitely recommened this desk for any home office.
customer_reviews.author: JackNine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gaming desk
customer_reviews.text: Hard to get two smalls chairs in there...I have twins
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Tera Johnstonbaugh-Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great. Aesthetically pleasing. Careful to not put hot stuff on it.
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my basement office. It works perfectly. Lots of desk space and aesthetically pleasing. Took me maybe less than 2 hours with my cousin helping. Only thing that I did hopefully you'll know not to do is don't put hot stuff on it. The laminate melts or something and starts to bubble under the surface.
customer_reviews.author: buklau

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I was happy they added 1 extra of each piece of hardware, as a need nut did not get tooled with thread. I do wish that each side would stay together tighter. Occasionally it is necessary to pull together and tighten. Other tahn those issues, it was easy to put together, look nice, sturdy and height adjustable. I'm pleased for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Flat2Peak

customer_reviews.title: Best Desk I've Seen
customer_reviews.text: This desk was of excellent quality and probably the easiest furniture piece I've ever put together. The hardware is packaged to match each step in the assembly process making it a no brainer. The materials are high quality and the desk is very sturdy. I expect it to last a very long time. I've paid more for far less quality so I'm very glad to find a product that truly exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: IT WAS EVERYTHING IT CLAIMS TO BE
customer_reviews.text: It appears stabled and should do the job. It looks exactly as it does in the picture. It came with all the parts. Instructions were easy to follow. You have to give 5 stars when it comes to furniture when all of the above are met. If your only hesitation is quality for what you are paying, you will not be disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: JAGMAN

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I received this product very quickly, only about three or so days after I placed the order which, was awesome, when the anticipated delivery date wasn't until the next week. It did take quite awhile to put together, not because it was difficult, but just because there were so many pieces to it, but it was well worth the effort. The product instructions were very easy to follow, and everything was very clearly labeled. It looks exactly like the picture. When put together, It is an extremely sturdy desk, and I am looking forward to studying at it. I am tremendously happy with the product, and I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Cgabmomof2

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, reliable desk
customer_reviews.text: I got this a year and a half ago and it has held up extremely well. Easy to clean (I've spilled many a drink on it) and was a great deal. The keyboard tray sucks just like most other desks, but it's easily dealt with. Assembly was easy enough, but took about an hour. It's a fairly large desk though, so that should be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: What a desk!
customer_reviews.text: This desk is perfect, and was able to put it together without any real problems. It did help that I've put together other desks and chairs, so for the step where you put it all together many of you should get some help. I had all the parts, and they even added a bag of spare bolts and such. Very sturdy when completed, and looks fine.
customer_reviews.author: Baggins

customer_reviews.title: would highly recommend..
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this desk, he has two monitors set up and his keyboard, still has room to do homework and projects, would highly recommend....
customer_reviews.author: Kay N. Mott

customer_reviews.title: Eligant look easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: I use this desk in my home office. It was easy to assemble and looks very nice. I was wondering how the experience would be sitting with the monitor in the corner on the stand due to the center legs being there. To my surprise the legs do not get in the way while working at the desk.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Banville

customer_reviews.title: Good looking modern and simple assembly...a perfect choice
customer_reviews.text: Simple assembly, sturdy and great looking desk. I found no quality control issues. All pieces were undamaged. Would recommend this desk to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. DiBs

customer_reviews.title: Great desk for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really nice desk, really easy to put together. Just worried about scratching or melting the desk top. Wish it was real wood or a more sturdy laminate top.
customer_reviews.author: Blind Spy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this desk. Took a while to set up but the instructions are easy if you follow them correctly. I also love the fact that you choose whether you want the long/short side of the table on the right or left.
customer_reviews.author: Antoine Sillah

customer_reviews.title: Great desk no cap
customer_reviews.text: Bought this desk back in 2017 and had it for two years and May I say this desk is great I have my whole gaming system setup as I wanted and there is plenty of room for me too add more onto the desk. Might buy another one soon for my brother. Great quality desk
customer_reviews.author: ismael perez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Sized Desk
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect! Nice sturdy desk that was easy to assemble in about an hour. I needed a desk for this odd shaped space in my house and this fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jannean

customer_reviews.title: Great Desk
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband's home office. It was well constructed. Easy to assemble. Well packaged. Each type of hardware was individual wrapped so that made it very helpful in figuring out which screw was which. Went together rather quickly with very little effort. Looks like I spent more that I did...so that is always a nice perk.
customer_reviews.author: Paula T. Bryant

customer_reviews.title: This is a good desk for the price but you can't put a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a good desk for the price but you can't put a bigger monitor on the platform if it is in a corner. I think the platform was designed for a printer but that is also a no go......it doesn't seem large enough to hold the printer I have either.
customer_reviews.author: swray

customer_reviews.title: Easy as one, two, three...
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased this desk for my home office. Much higher than I originally anticipated, the desk was easily assembled in a matter of minutes and looks great. I'm particularly taken with the ability to re-arrange the position of the L to better fit the layout of my home office...
customer_reviews.author: Marcus E. Sharpe

customer_reviews.title: I was truly impressed with the packaging of this desk ...
customer_reviews.text: I was truly impressed with the packaging of this desk. It was double boxed, everything was wrapped to avoid scratches, and just enough Styrofoam to protect the pieces. The instructions were concisely written and well illustrated. The assembly was straight forward and simple to follow. The sturdiness of the desk is good/great. It does not wobble nor flex too much.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Great desk for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the desk for about 2 months now and its great, plenty of room for a home office. PRO's Very Sturdy Looks more expensive than it is Can choose from multiple configurations. Pretty easy to put together - 2 hours with the tools provided CONs None so far
customer_reviews.author: rick shere

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good looking sturdy desk. we used this in the boys computer room. Outlined the back of it in LEDs.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Sweda

customer_reviews.title: Great looking desk
customer_reviews.text: It took me about 75 minutes to install this desk and looks great when assembled. My only complaint is that the leg in the bag is attached at only one point, so you really have to be careful when moving the desk. I would have preferred for it to attach to the desk at multiple points because it feels a bit flimsy. Other than that, the desk looks great and is very functional.
customer_reviews.author: Ross A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice product!
customer_reviews.text: Im happy with this desk, looks nice and multiple options to set it up.
customer_reviews.author: Salar Safar

customer_reviews.title: I love this desk
customer_reviews.text: I love this desk. Although it's a bit large, it's pretty sturdy and has great features. The pull out drawer for the keyboard was broken on arrival, but even that doesn't impair usability in any meaningful way.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Horecka

customer_reviews.title: Happy Grandson
customer_reviews.text: My grandson kept complaining he didn't have enough room on his present desk to lay his books out to do his homework and also have his monitor and keyboard on the desk. I purchased the L shape desk for him and he loves it, he has room for everything, with some left over.
customer_reviews.author: Gagun

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: cons: - right price -right size -easy to build -if you know what you are doing you can do different layouts pros: none *Update had the desk for 4 year, the corner piece doesnt hold up well anymore*
customer_reviews.author: Johnny D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great desk lots of space. The only downside is the material but if you follow the instructions and DO NOT over tighten the fasteners you will love this desk for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri & Junior love Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Scratches everywhere
customer_reviews.text: It is nice but scratches really easy. That happened by only moving my computer around... and I only have for 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Thorvarium

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy desk
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice sturdy desk. But beware, it comes in 3 heavy boxes. It takes quite a bit of time and effort to put together, but once done it looks great and is quite strong and sturdy. There is a lot of space. I use one side (the one with the keyboard tray) for my computer, and the other side as a work/study station. We had to move once and though I disassembled the L for easier transportation, the table is still sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: renne

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, beautiful desk
customer_reviews.text: Hands down, best desk I've purchased in my life. Perfect for home office. I read a lot of the reviews here before I purchased, and I honestly think some people are too hard on their desks. I work from home 9-5 every day, I've had this desk about a month, and it literally looks brand new still. For anyone who expects a desk to last longer than 5 years, I would tell you that a computer does too, but you just have to update things. Again, I would recommend this desk.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: The look is great, the quality and wonderful, the price is better, and the instructions were super simple. Took me less than an hour to put together -- and I used their tiny tools! Can't beat it...
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: First-rate - easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: A very, very decent bargain for the price. This was cheaper than buying a lesser-quality desk from Staples, and it was simple to assemble. The instructions were first-rate, which surprised me. Overall, a very good quality product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: UpInTheAir

customer_reviews.title: Solid table (except for the screws)
customer_reviews.text: Overall this table is solid, but I wish the screw heads were more solid. The wear very quickly just be screwing them in, so if you want to take them out for any reason, it's near impossible to do with a screwdriver.
customer_reviews.author: az

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this desk. I needed a big L shaped desk to have my PC on one side, and my work PC on the other. This has plenty of room for both.
customer_reviews.author: captainstormy

customer_reviews.title: love this desk!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a desk for home school. I wanted one with plenty of room. This desk is plenty big enough for two (but not two chairs) and is sturdy. The quality of materials is impressive. I am pleasantly surprised. I would and have recommended this product to friends and family. One should know this desk can be set up two different ways and easily to meet one's needs.
customer_reviews.author: Danestee Porter

customer_reviews.title: Awesome desk.
customer_reviews.text: This was the easiest thing I have ever put together. All the pieces were there, and fit perfectly. This is a heavy, quality desk. You don't really know about furniture you order online sometimes, but this is A+
customer_reviews.author: L. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Terrific desk
customer_reviews.text: I bought this desk about two years ago and it has proven a great purchase. No problems with the finish or mechanics. I use it everyday and the keyboard tray remains stable and smooth in its operation. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholastree

customer_reviews.title: Great desk, real nice!
customer_reviews.text: The rear support foot screw is too short, so i doubled up foot pad sliders - tape backing - and the aet up the difference. No worries! Very nice desk - heavy, well built for particle board! Lol! Excellent price too!
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni

customer_reviews.title: Totally a wonderful buy.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small office desk but one that I could share with my child. This desk is very well built. Went together easily with two people. It fits my small office and I can share it with my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: K. L. Paal

customer_reviews.title: Good Sturdy Desk
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice desk. Got here quickly and with all its parts. Its pretty sturdy so if you use it for gaming instead of office work it can take a couple hulk smashes. Keyboard tray works well but if you use it the desk can only seat one. I could've figured that out but i was too lazy to do math.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Upton

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: just what the doctor odered ,,, love the space i have now , but it takes hours to put it together
customer_reviews.author: bobby quick

customer_reviews.title: Unit is study and was not to hard to assemble ...
customer_reviews.text: Unit is study and was not to hard to assemble. The keyboard drawer is a little close to the top of the desk but I use a larger style keyboard. I used a real screw driver as opposed to the one that was included but just for convenience, the included one works. All parts were clearly labelled to ease assembly.
customer_reviews.author: DaveGA

customer_reviews.title: Long-term review
customer_reviews.text: This desk has served me well for four years now. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Erik L

customer_reviews.title: Solid and priced well.
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid desk that perfectly meets our needs. the picture give teh impression that it is cheap in some regards but it isn't. the only issue we do have is the keyboard slide out. It seems not to come out far enough. We will adjust it so it can be properly utilized. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: DBS

customer_reviews.title: For the new office.
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased this quality product and have nothing poor to say about it. A massive upgrade from our old fiber board desk station, this composite wood and steel frame office desk suites all of our needs and has a nice, stylish appeal my Fiance truelly appreciates. All the parts and desk sections were in great condition upon arrival and there was little difficulty assembling this great product.
customer_reviews.author: Yaterace

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and tons of flat desk space
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and tons of flat desk space. I dont like the keyboard drawer, so I left it off. Still plenty of room for my monitor, mouse/pad, and keyboard all on the flat workspace.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Lambert

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: This computer desk has all the space you will ever need, the wood is so smooth and the color is perfect for any room. The size of the desk is enormous, which is great if you need extra monitors for your computer and other accessories. It shipped very quickly to me in Florida, I was expecting it 2 days later than normal and it took me about 4 hours to assemble it all by myself (without any power tools). I didn't get charged any shipping costs at all, definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kalec

customer_reviews.title: Ohhh Flat!
customer_reviews.text: One Desk, comes complete in two boxs. Its going to take you awhile to put together but its very well built. Steel frame construction ensures it should last some time!
customer_reviews.author: Dev

customer_reviews.title: Great Desk
customer_reviews.text: if you are looking for a L shaped desk with a lot of work space this is it. it is a little darker than I wanted but looks great. very well made, does not feel or look cheap. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MCMLIX

customer_reviews.title: Love this desk!
customer_reviews.text: Nice desk. Very pleased. My husband put it together without difficulty. Looks very nice in our computer room. Fast shipping as well. Extremely pleased with purchase!!:)
customer_reviews.author: Karen Summerfield

customer_reviews.title: A good bargain for a desk
customer_reviews.text: I have hunted around for a number of home office desk solutions. The amount of work surface area for the price was the best I have found. With a metal frame this desk is sturdy. I had a Bush home office desk which was all particle board and therefore weighed litterally a ton. It was a cheap construction (Bush) and fell apart when moving to vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: RKC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, fits in small space. Easily has room for two computers, large printer, and paper trays.
customer_reviews.author: Em T.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged for shipping. Arrived early and undamaged. Easy assembly. Sturdy and just as advertised. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Professional looking
customer_reviews.text: Looks very good, went together easily, for the price, you can not go wrong. Just take your time assembling this.
customer_reviews.author: sybot

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise a good desk.
customer_reviews.text: was partially damaged, not enough to warrant a return. The corner of the top was damaged in the packaging from the manufacturer. Otherwise a good desk.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Tubman

customer_reviews.title: Good L-Shaped Desk with quality !!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good, strong, well made desk for me to replaced the old desk that I have it for a long time, reasonable price, not too big in my room.
customer_reviews.author: Toby  Wu

customer_reviews.title: Best Desk For the Money
customer_reviews.text: Someone designed and manufactured the perfect desk for ones home. Materials are of a high quality with a pleasing visual presence. I really like it. It is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, EASY setup...
customer_reviews.text: It is very rare that a product makes me want to take time out of my day to write a review. This product did. I'll be quick, here is what I love about the desk: 1.) Quality manufacturing and a solid feel 2.) Looks great once put together 3.) EASY setup. The instructions were clear and everything was labeled perfectly. I would recommend for any home or business office.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good desk - well built with a durable top surface. Directions for putting it together were very good.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Hart

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with this desk. It is very well constructed and easy to put together. I put it together as pictured but it didn't fit my room well. I easily reversed it putting the keyboard side on the right and it fit perfectly. Awesome look, great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rosborough

customer_reviews.title: minor flaws, overall okay.
customer_reviews.text: I have large legs so do not use the keyboard tray. which is fortunate because I can use it as a filler for the back leg of the middle section which doesn't quite reach the ground. overall the desk suits my needs and is stable enough for three large monitors.
customer_reviews.author: Ris Adams

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. The desk is very sturdy and was relatively easy to put together (although there are alot of parts). I really like the look of it and the L-shape is very functional as it allows space for papers and writing while your laptop/computer is on the smaller portion. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: rowill

customer_reviews.title: Great desk
customer_reviews.text: It's a little work to put together, but it's a great desk, a great value and looks so great and much bigger in person, arrived fast and with no damage
customer_reviews.author: Michael Soma

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly, solid quality.
customer_reviews.text: The box arrived in rough shape but luckily it was well packaged and was fine inside. Assembly was easy with good instructions. Looks great and feels like it will hold up for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Will Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: modernized and cleaned up my parents computer area. lots of space for all computer and peripherals.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

product_meta.title: RTA Products -M615, Dark Wood
product_meta.description:
This contemporary Techni Mobili L-Shaped Computer Desk has a spacious desktop that can be configured to your preference, with the long and short sides being interchangeable. It features an elevated corner accessory shelf, and a large slide-out keyboard shelf equipped with a safety stop that is also interchangeable. It is made with heavy-duty engineered wood panels with a moisture resistant PVC laminate veneer and a scratch-resistant powder-coated steel frame. The rectangular desktop panels each have a 50lbs weight capacity, while the corner desktop panel and keyboard shelf each have a 30lbs weight capacity, and the accessory shelf holds up to 20lbs. Color: Mahogany.
Ships in 2 Boxes
feature_bullets: Heavy-duty MDF panels with a moisture resistant PVC laminate veneer in mahogany finish
Long and short sides of desktop are interchangeable left or right
Keyboard is interchangeable left or right

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars265 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
